reviews.text: We stayed here one night and had a very good night's rest. The room was fairly well appointed, with bathrobe and bedroom slippers as well, and the bed was very comfortable with plush bedding.
reviews.title: Very clean & comfortable, anyone's throw from Guggeheim

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: In terms of location, it is perfect for visiting the Guggenheim which is just across the road.
reviews.title: Arty hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Service was efficient and friendly. We drove up to the driveway and our luggage was collected and car parked.
reviews.title: Pleasant stay but lacks attention to detail
13 new pictures of this Art hotel. In need of some investment. Roof terrace and gym have a beautiful view.
reviews.text: There's a restaurant by Martin Berasategui on the 7th floor with excellent views of the Guggenheim. We didn't dine there though but wish we had instead of Nerua at the Guggenheim.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This is a great place to manage spain time. The downstairs cafe allows you to eat any time, important in Spain for an Aussie wanting an early night. It is located directly across from the Guggenhime so the vireos are fantastic. It is clean airy and very modern and artsy. All good. Location is also great not to far from the different bits of the city.
reviews.title: Average Hotel - you pay for the View and Location

reviews.text: I actually giggled with glee when I opened the curtains to see the Guggenheim just outside my window. I felt like I could just reach out of my window and touch it! I thought it the noise level would not be bearable on the side of the hotel facing the museum, but it was fine.
reviews.title: What a view!

reviews.text: The rooms, and hotel decor overall, are very stylish and modern. The staff was very pleasant and helpful. One evening I accidentally left my coat in the bar without realizing that i did not have it. Within about 20 minutes, someone from the staff came to my room to return it to me.
reviews.title: Just perfect!!

reviews.text: The breakfast selections, both hot and cold, were tasty. My friends and I ate dinner in the restaurant one evening. Again, everything was tasty, but nothing memorable...especially compared to what we ate at other places in town.
reviews.title: Wonderful location in Bilbao right over the road from the Guggenheim

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This is a lovely 5-star property in Bilbao's most amazing location, just opposite the stunning Guggenheim Museum, steps from the city centre and surely well served by public transportation - the bus from/to the airport leaves just 30 metres from the hotel, and so does the trambus.
reviews.title: Must be the best view in Bilbao

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: A modern property with lovely well designed rooms with all the services. Lots of luxury toiletries and accessories you may need - for instance the plastic bags for liquids to be used at the airport!
reviews.title: Design Hotel, Loved It !

reviews.text: Best place to stay if you are there just for the Guggenheim - it is right opposite. But a good hotel altogether, modern and quiet. Fabulous terrace restaurant where you have your breakfast while admiring the modern shape of the museum. There is even an egg station where you can have your eggs prepared as you like them. Very efficient staff at reception. High-class toiletries. Unfortunately only one vanity in bathroom though there would have been plenty of room for
reviews.title: Great place

reviews.text: double vanities. Great pillows.
reviews.title: best possible

reviews.text: If you are visiting Bilbao I think this is the best possible hotel around. The location can not be any better. the staff are very friendly and helpful . Rooms are nice size modern and clean the restaurant on the 7 th is perfect for breakfast and dinner. I highly recommend this hotelç
reviews.title: breat city break hotel

reviews.text: excellent hotel; cafe great; all staff friendly, smart; rooms very modern, spacious and clean; location excellent for Guggenheim and Bellas Artes; main restaurant is supposedly very good although I did not eat there, however I thought it looked a little small, as was the gym. I would definitely return for a city break.
reviews.title: Great location, friendly staff

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Stayed here at end if weeks touring of Northern Spain. Staff were very helpful when we arrived and as I wasn't feeling well got our room ready. Great view of the museum and very near the Fine Art Museum. Easy team trip or walk to old town.
reviews.title: really a 4* business hotel

reviews.text: Stayed here for one night only. We arrived very late and were starving after a long day of travelling but the staff found us a restaurant down the street that was still open.
reviews.title: Great location, cool design, friendly staff

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We checked in to our rooms later and found both 307 and 507 to be perfectly comfortable, although neither room had windows with outside views, only towards some narrow shaft. I guess that is why they were relatively inexpensive, but we would have insisted on rooms with a view if we were to have stayed for longer.
reviews.title: Excellent hotel with great views of Guggenheim Museum

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The next day we had our very expensive breakfasts ( Eur 26 pp. ) on the 7th floor. The menu was extensive, the staff friendly and the views amazing, with the Guggenheim just across the street.
reviews.title: Not five star

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Check out went smoothly, they kept our luggage for a few hours and called a taxi when we needed one.
reviews.title: Trendy and expensive

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed April 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Nicely designed hotel with very friendly staff in a location that can't be beat.
reviews.title: Best Location for a Museum Visit
